get.description: Configuration of Certificate TA (Trust Anchor) and Certificate RCP (Revocation-Check-Point).

post.description: List of TA(Trust-anchor) Profiles. TA profile contains configuration related to TrustedCert like RCP/OCSP/CRL etc.,

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the TA Profile to be configured.

get.description: List of TA(Trust-anchor) Profiles. TA profile contains configuration related to TrustedCert like RCP/OCSP/CRL etc.,

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the TA Profile to be configured.

patch.description: List of TA(Trust-anchor) Profiles. TA profile contains configuration related to TrustedCert like RCP/OCSP/CRL etc.,

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the TA Profile to be configured.

delete.description: List of TA(Trust-anchor) Profiles. TA profile contains configuration related to TrustedCert like RCP/OCSP/CRL etc.,

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the TA Profile to be configured.

delete_object_type.name: object_type
delete_object_type.description: LOCAL - To delete local objects. SHARED - To delete shared objects. Default - Defaults to SHARED if not provided

delete_scope_id.name: scope_id
delete_scope_id.description: Scope at which local object needs to be deleted. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

delete_persona.name: persona
delete_persona.description: Persona for which the local object needs to be deleted. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

post_object_type.name: object_type
post_object_type.description: LOCAL - To create local objects. SHARED - To create shared objects. Default - Defaults to SHARED if not provided

post_scope_id.name: scope_id
post_scope_id.description: Scope at which local object needs to be created. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

post_persona.name: persona
post_persona.description: Persona for which the local object needs to be created. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

patch_object_type.name: object_type
patch_object_type.description: LOCAL - To update local objects. SHARED - To update shared objects. Default - Defaults to SHARED if not provided

patch_scope_id.name: scope_id
patch_scope_id.description: Scope at which local object needs to be updated. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

patch_persona.name: persona
patch_persona.description: Persona for which the local object needs to be updated. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

get_object_type.name: object_type
get_object_type.description: Retrieves LOCAL or SHARED or both(default) configuration objects.

get_scope_id.name: scope_id
get_scope_id.description: Configuration at a given scope. Mandatory for view_type = LOCAL.

get_persona.name: persona
get_persona.description: Filters configuration specific to given persona type. If not provided and view_type = LOCAL, then defaults to all persona.

effective.name: effective
effective.description: True - Returns effective configuration (i.e hierarchically merged configuration). False - Returns committed configuration at a given scope.

detailed.name: detailed
detailed.description: True - Includes annotations in the returned json to indicate the type of object, scope, and persona. False - Returns only config objects without annotations.

view_type.name: view_type
view_type.description: LIBRARY - Returns shared objects in library. For LIBRARY, all other parameters listed below, except 'detailed' , will be ignored. LOCAL - Returns configurations for a scope and one or more persona based on parameters below.

schema.description: The number of requests left for the time window.

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: The number of requests left for the time window.

schema.description: The UTC date/time at which the current rate limit window resets.

X-RateLimit-Reset.description: The UTC date/time at which the current rate limit window resets.

ArubaCertificateRcp_CertificateRcpSchema.description: Configuration of Certificate TA (Trust Anchor) and Certificate RCP (Revocation-Check-Point).

ta-profile.description: List of TA(Trust-anchor) Profiles. TA profile contains configuration related to TrustedCert like RCP/OCSP/CRL etc.,

name.description: Name of the TA Profile to be configured.

trusted-certificate.description: Trusted CA certificate to be used in validation of RCP responses and other peer certificates.

x-enumDescriptions.CRL: Certificate Revocation List(CRL) as RCP Type.
x-enumDescriptions.OCSP: Online Certificate Status Protocol(OCSP) as RCP Type.

rcp-primary-method.description: Primary RCP method. Default is None.

x-enumDescriptions.CRL: Certificate Revocation List(CRL) as RCP Type.
x-enumDescriptions.OCSP: Online Certificate Status Protocol(OCSP) as RCP Type.

rcp-secondary-method.description: Secondary RCP method. Valid only if primary rcp method is configured.

ssh-username.description: Set the user-name for whose certificate is validated with ta-profile for two-factor authentication.

responder-cert.description: OCSP Responder Cert to verify OCSP responses.

signer-cert.description: OCSP Signer Cert to sign the OCSP request/responses.

primary-url.x-typeDescription:
An ASCII-encoded Uniform Resource Locator (URL) as defined
in RFC 3986, section 1.1.3
primary-url.description: Configuration of OCSP Primary Server URL.

secondary-url.x-typeDescription:
An ASCII-encoded Uniform Resource Locator (URL) as defined
in RFC 3986, section 1.1.3
secondary-url.description: Configuration of OCSP Secondary Server URL.

delegate.description: Enable Delegate mode for OCSP revocation

delegate-url-leaf-cert.x-typeDescription:
An ASCII-encoded Uniform Resource Locator (URL) as defined
in RFC 3986, section 1.1.3
delegate-url-leaf-cert.description: OCSP Responder URL to check the revocation status for the leaf certificate

delegate-url-intermediate-cert1.x-typeDescription:
An ASCII-encoded Uniform Resource Locator (URL) as defined
in RFC 3986, section 1.1.3
delegate-url-intermediate-cert1.description: OCSP Responder URL to check the revocation status for the intermedidate certificate 1

delegate-url-intermediate-cert2.x-typeDescription:
An ASCII-encoded Uniform Resource Locator (URL) as defined
in RFC 3986, section 1.1.3
delegate-url-intermediate-cert2.description: OCSP Responder URL to check the revocation status for the intermedidate certificate 2

delegate-url-intermediate-cert3.x-typeDescription:
An ASCII-encoded Uniform Resource Locator (URL) as defined
in RFC 3986, section 1.1.3
delegate-url-intermediate-cert3.description: OCSP Responder URL to check the revocation status for the intermedidate certificate 3

disable-nonce.description: Disable inclusion of the nonce in OCSP requests.

x-enumDescriptions.REVOKE_CERT: Assume Certificate is revoked if OCSP Server is unreachable.
x-enumDescriptions.ALLOW_CERT: Assume Certificate is good if OCSP Server is unreachable.
x-enumDescriptions.FAIL_OVER: Fail over to next RCP method if OCSP Server is unreachable.

enforcement-level.x-typeDescription: The enforcement policy for when an revocation check cannot be completed.
enforcement-level.description: Configure the enforcement policy for when an revocation check cannot be completed.

vrf.x-typeDescription: Type definition for 'name', should be alphanumeric. Special characters such as '\', '/' and space are not allowed.

primary-url.x-typeDescription:
An ASCII-encoded Uniform Resource Locator (URL) as defined
in RFC 3986, section 1.1.3

secondary-url.x-typeDescription:
An ASCII-encoded Uniform Resource Locator (URL) as defined
in RFC 3986, section 1.1.3

x-enumDescriptions.REVOKE_CERT: Assume Certificate is revoked if OCSP Server is unreachable.
x-enumDescriptions.ALLOW_CERT: Assume Certificate is good if OCSP Server is unreachable.
x-enumDescriptions.FAIL_OVER: Fail over to next RCP method if OCSP Server is unreachable.

enforcement-level.x-typeDescription: The enforcement policy for when an revocation check cannot be completed.
enforcement-level.description: Action to be taken when CRL Server is unreachable. Default: Fail-Over.

refresh-interval.description: CRL periodic update interval in hours

ANY.description: Any of local or shared config object.

Successful200.description: Success response returned from the server.

Error400.description: Error details returned from the server.

message.example: Bad request. Invalid values supplied in request.

message.example: Not found. Yang / Corresponding Rule is missing.
